name: Badrinath
description: Badrinath is one of the holy shrines for Vaishnavites among the 108 Divya Desams, located in the beautiful town of Badrinath.
bestTimeToVisit: May, Jun, Jul, Aug, Sep, Oct, Nov
history: The temple was built by Adi Shankaracharya in the 8th century. It stands as one of the holiest shrines for Vaishnavites, attracting pilgrims from all over the world.
weather: Summers are mild with temperatures ranging between 15°C and 30°C, while winters are cold with snowfall.
howToReach: The nearest railway station is Rishikesh, and the nearest airport is Jolly Grant. Roads connect Badrinath to various cities in Uttarakhand.

name: Kedarnath
description: Kedarnath is a highly revered temple dedicated to Lord Shiva, located in the Himalayas.
history: The temple is believed to have been built by the Pandavas and revived by Adi Shankaracharya.
weather: Kedarnath experiences sub-zero temperatures in winters, while summers are moderate.
howToReach: Trekking from Gaurikund is required to reach Kedarnath. Helicopter services are also available.

name: Rameshwaram
description: Rameshwaram is one of the twelve Jyotirlinga temples dedicated to Lord Shiva, located in Tamil Nadu.
history: Rameshwaram has a rich history connected to Lord Rama. It is believed that Lord Rama built a bridge from Rameshwaram to Sri Lanka.
weather: Summers are hot and humid. Winters are pleasant, making it the best time to visit.
howToReach: Rameshwaram has its own railway station. The nearest airport is Madurai.

name: Somnath
description: Somnath Temple is one of the first among the twelve Jyotirlinga shrines of Shiva, located in Gujarat.
history: The temple has been destroyed and rebuilt several times, with the present temple being constructed in 1951.
weather: Pleasant winters and hot summers.
howToReach: Veraval is the nearest railway station. Diu is the nearest airport.

name: Tirupati Balaji
description: Tirupati Balaji is one of the most famous pilgrimage sites in India, dedicated to Lord Venkateswara.
history: The temple has been patronized by various kings and is one of the richest temples in the world.
weather: Summers are hot, while winters are pleasant.
howToReach: The nearest railway station is Tirupati. The nearest airport is Tirupati Airport.

name: Vaishno Devi
description: Vaishno Devi is a sacred pilgrimage site dedicated to the goddess Vaishno Devi, located in the Trikuta Mountains.
history: The cave temple is one of the most important pilgrimages for Hindus. Millions visit every year to seek blessings.
weather: Summers are pleasant, while winters can be harsh with snowfall.
howToReach: Katra is the nearest railway station. Jammu Airport is the closest airport.

name: Chausath Yogini Temple
description: Chausath Yogini Temple is an ancient Hindu temple dedicated to the 64 Yoginis, located in Bhubaneswar. It is renowned for its unique circular architecture and sculptural details.
history: Built during the 9th century by the Somavamsa dynasty, the temple is known for its distinctive circular plan and its association with Tantric worship.
weather: Tropical climate with hot summers and mild winters.
howToReach: Accessible by rail, road; nearest airport is in Bhubaneswar.

name: Golden Temple
description: The Golden Temple, also known as Harmandir Sahib, is the holiest site in Sikhism, located in Amritsar.
history: Built in the 16th century by Guru Arjan, it is a symbol of Sikh faith and community service.
weather: Summers can be very hot, while winters are cool and pleasant.
howToReach: Well connected by rail, road, and air.

name: Kashi Vishwanath Temple
description: Kashi Vishwanath Temple is one of the most famous Hindu temples dedicated to Lord Shiva, located in the holy city of Varanasi.
history: The temple has been a significant site for Hindu devotees for centuries, with historical texts mentioning its prominence.
weather: Summers are hot, while winters are mild and comfortable.
howToReach: Easily accessible by rail, road, and air.

name: Jagannath Temple
description: Jagannath Temple is a significant Hindu temple dedicated to Lord Jagannath, located in Puri.
history: The temple is famous for the annual Rath Yatra festival, a tradition that dates back to ancient times.
weather: Tropical climate with hot and humid summers, mild winters.
howToReach: Well connected by rail and road; nearest airport is in Bhubaneswar.

name: Somnath Temple
description: Somnath Temple is a renowned Hindu temple dedicated to Lord Shiva, located in Prabhas Patan.
history: It is one of the twelve Jyotirlingas and has been rebuilt several times after being destroyed by invaders.
weather: Hot summers, mild winters.
howToReach: Accessible by road from Veraval; nearest airport is in Diu.

name: Rameswaram Temple
description: Rameswaram Temple is a prominent Hindu temple dedicated to Lord Shiva, situated on the Rameswaram Island.
history: It is one of the twelve Jyotirlingas and holds significant mythological importance in Hinduism.
weather: Tropical climate with hot summers and mild winters.
howToReach: Connected by train, bus; nearest airport is in Madurai.

name: Meenakshi Temple
description: Meenakshi Temple is an ancient Hindu temple dedicated to the goddess Meenakshi, located in Madurai.
history: The temple is a significant pilgrimage site, known for its intricate Dravidian architecture.
weather: Hot and humid climate throughout the year.
howToReach: Accessible by rail, road; nearest airport is in Madurai.

name: Kalighat Temple
description: Kalighat Temple is an important Hindu temple dedicated to Goddess Kali, situated in Kolkata.
nearestAirport: Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose International Airport, 20 kms
history: The temple is one of the 51 Shakti Peethas, where it is believed that the toe of Sati fell.
weather: Tropical climate with hot and humid summers and mild winters.
howToReach: Accessible by rail, road; nearest airport is in Kolkata.

name: Siddhivinayak Temple
description: Siddhivinayak Temple is a famous Hindu temple dedicated to Lord Ganesha, located in Mumbai.
history: Founded in 1801, it is renowned for its dedication to Lord Ganesha and attracts numerous devotees.
weather: Mumbai experiences a tropical climate with hot and humid conditions year-round.
howToReach: Well connected by rail, road, and air.

name: Kedarnath Temple
description: Kedarnath Temple is a revered Hindu temple dedicated to Lord Shiva, located in the Kedarnath range of the Himalayas.
history: One of the twelve Jyotirlingas, the temple was originally built by the Pandavas and later renovated.
weather: Very cold winters with heavy snowfall; mild summers.
howToReach: Accessible by trek from Gaurikund or by helicopter services from Phata.

name: Ranganathaswamy Temple
description: Ranganathaswamy Temple is a grand Hindu temple dedicated to Lord Vishnu, located in Srirangam.
history: Considered one of the largest functioning Hindu temples in the world, it is a major pilgrimage site.
weather: Tropical climate with hot and humid conditions throughout the year.
howToReach: Well connected by rail and road; nearest airport is in Tiruchirappalli.

name: Balaji Temple
description: Balaji Temple, also known as Tirumala Venkateswara Temple, is a prominent Hindu temple dedicated to Lord Venkateswara, located in Tirupati.
history: One of the most visited temples in India, it is famous for its deity Lord Venkateswara, an incarnation of Vishnu.
weather: Tropical climate with hot summers and mild winters.
howToReach: Accessible by rail, road; nearest airport is in Tirupati.

name: Brihadeeswarar Temple
description: Brihadeeswarar Temple, also known as Peruvudaiyar Kovil, is a grand Hindu temple dedicated to Lord Shiva, located in Thanjavur.
history: Built by Rajaraja Chola I in the 11th century, it is a masterpiece of Chola architecture.
weather: Hot and humid throughout the year.
howToReach: Accessible by rail, road; nearest airport is in Tiruchirappalli.

name: Chidambaram Temple
description: Chidambaram Temple, also known as Thillai Nataraja Temple, is a major Hindu temple dedicated to Lord Shiva, located in Chidambaram.
history: The temple is renowned for its unique architecture and for being a center of classical dance performances.
weather: Tropical climate with hot and humid conditions year-round.
howToReach: Well connected by rail and road; nearest airport is in Tiruchirappalli.

name: Kumarakom Temple
description: Kumarakom Temple is an ancient Hindu temple located in the scenic village of Kumarakom, Kerala.
history: The temple is known for its serene surroundings and traditional Kerala temple architecture.
weather: Tropical climate with moderate to heavy rainfall during monsoon.
howToReach: Accessible by rail, road; nearest airport is in Cochin.

name: Mahabalipuram Temple
description: Mahabalipuram Temple, also known as Mamallapuram, is a historic group of temples and rock-cut sculptures located in Mahabalipuram.
history: The temples were built by the Pallava dynasty in the 7th century and are known for their intricate carvings.
weather: Tropical climate with hot and humid conditions year-round.
howToReach: Accessible by rail, road; nearest airport is in Chennai.

name: Hampi Temple
description: Hampi Temple complex is a group of temples located in the ruins of Hampi, known for their architectural grandeur.
history: Once the capital of the Vijayanagara Empire, Hampi is renowned for its ancient temples and monuments.
weather: Hot and dry climate with mild winters.
howToReach: Accessible by rail, road; nearest airport is in Hubli.

name: Tirunelveli Temple
description: Tirunelveli Temple is a significant Hindu temple located in Tirunelveli, known for its rich history and architecture.
history: The temple is known for its ancient architectural style and historical relevance in Tamil Nadu.
weather: Hot and dry climate with mild winters.
howToReach: Well connected by rail and road; nearest airport is in Tiruchirappalli.

name: Nanjing Temple
description: Nanjing Temple is an ancient Buddhist temple known for its cultural and historical significance in Nanjing.
history: The temple has been a significant site for Buddhist worship and cultural activities for centuries.
weather: Subtropical climate with hot summers and cold winters.
howToReach: Well connected by rail and air.
